SELECT ROWNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT C.CM_NO, C.USER_NO, M.USER_ID, C.CM_TITLE, C.CM_CONTENT, C.CM_READCOUNT, C.CM_DATE, C.CM_MODIFY_DATE, C.CM_STATUS FROM COMMUNITY C JOIN MEMBER M ON(C.USER_NO = M.USER_NO) WHERE C.CM_STATUS = 'Y'
AND (C.CM_TITLE LIKE '%'|| #{searchText} ||'%' OR C.CM_CONTENT LIKE '%'|| #{searchText} ||'%')
ORDER BY CM_NO DESC)A

SELECT ROWNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT C.CM_NO, C.USER_NO, M.USER_ID, C.CM_TITLE, C.CM_CONTENT, C.CM_READCOUNT, C.CM_DATE, C.CM_MODIFY_DATE, C.CM_STATUS FROM COMMUNITY C JOIN MEMBER M ON(C.USER_NO = M.USER_NO) WHERE C.CM_STATUS = 'Y' AND M.USER_ID = #{userId} ORDER BY CM_NO DESC)A
